form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service Application for Naturalization, N-4 (000

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/26/2023 U.S. Department of Just OMB #1115-0009 Immigration and Naturalization Service Application for Naturalization START HERE - Please Type or Print FOR INS USE ONLY Part 1. Information about you. Returned Receipt Family Given Middle Name SAinT- Louis Name Elemond Initial U.S. Mailing Address - Care of Resubmitted Street Number Apt. and Name 1085 NW 14A St. # City County MiAmi DADE State ZIP Il Code 33168 Reloc Sent Date of Birth Country (month/day/year) 08-25-1915 of Birth HAiti Social A Security # 592-04-5099 042495127 Reloc Rec'd Part 2. Basis for Eligibility (check one). a. I have been a permanent resident for at least five (5) years b. I have been a permanent resident for at least three (3) years and have been married to a United States Citizen for those three years. Applicant C. I am a permanent resident child of United States citizen parent(s) Interviewed d. I am applying on the basis of qualifying military service in the Armed Forces of the U.S. and have attached completed Forms N-426 and G-325B Other. (Please specify section of law) At interview e. request naturalization ceremony at court Part 3. Additional information about you. Remarks Date you became a permanent (JSS) Port admitted with an immmigrant visa or INS Office resident (month/day/year) where granted adjustment of status. USE/AR/ASOA917-4-98 12-02-90 MiAmi Internal tional AiRport Citizenship ISSI S&R PD 12/4/98 HAitian US q ett 2/4/99 Name on alien registration card (if different than in Part 1) Other names used since you became a permanent resident (including maiden name) Sex Male Height Marital Status: Single Divorced Female Married Widowed Can you speak, read and write English ? No Yes. Action Absences from the U.S.: Have you been absent from the U.S. since becoming a permanent resident? No Yes. If you answered "Yes" , complete the following Begin with your most recent absence. If you need more room to explain the reason for an absence or to list more trips, continue on separate paper. Did absence last Date left U.S. Date returned 6 months or more? Destination Reason for trip Yes No Yes No To Be Completed by Attorney or Representative, if any Yes No Fill in box if G-28 is attached to represent the applicant Yes No VOLAG# Yes No Yes No ATTY State License # Form N-400 (Rev. 07/17/91)N Continued on back.
